item.description:
Join us on a winter edition of our Lansdowne Street Pub Crawl!

Here is the schedule:

2:00 p.m. - Jillian's (2nd Floor)
3:00 p.m. - Lansdowne Pub
4:00 p.m. - House of Blues
5:00 p.m. - Bleacher Bar
6:00 p.m. - Cask'n Flagon
7:00 p.m. - Game On
8:00 p.m. - Boston Beer Works

This crawl has been opened up to the following Meetup.com groups as well as to my Facebook friends:
- Fun With Alcohol!
- Red Sox Natives

Be sure to let your friends know about this too! The more, the merrier!
item.how_to_find_us: Just look for me at the bar... I look like my photo and I'm friendly!
item.name: Lansdowne Street Pub Crawl - Winter Edition
